DOC.brief_summary: An unmasked trial after bilateral implantation of AcrySof® ReSTOR®, SA60D3 IOL . Enrolled are at least 30 patients or as much as possible from the doctor's clinical practice perspective. 6 months follow-up after IOL implant in the 2nd eye
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Assessment of Visual Function With the Acrysof ReSTOR Multifocal IOL
DOC.criteria: Able to complete all required postoperative visits; Planned cataract removal by phaco; 21 years of age or older, either gender or any race; potential postoperative visual acuity of 20/20; astigmatism ≦1.0D measured by keratometry in study eye(s);clear int Signs of capsular tear, significant anterior chamber hyphema;zonular rupture; corneal pathology and refractive surgery;hypercritical patient; patients with unrealistic expectations in postop VA; happy to wear glasses;occupational night drivers
